title: Legal battle over travel ban looms as Trump continues attacks on judge
text: "It's just very frustrating to the president, to our whole administration, to millions of Americans who want to see judges that will uphold the law and recognize the authority the president of the United States has under the Constitution to manage who comes into this country," Pence said in another interview, on NBC's "Meet the Press."
summary: "It's just very frustrating to the president, to our whole administration, to millions of Americans who want to see judges that will uphold the law and recognize the authority the president of the United States has under the Constitution to manage who comes into this country," Pence said in another interview, on NBC's "Meet the Press."
